Text.Page:
The {@LinkCreature:20#30048000#hammerhand slaves} and {@LinkCreature:20#30048001#stonecrusher slaves} in the southern section of the cave in the Halls of Shadow are blocking the way to the central part of the Halls of Utterdark. We've got to clear a path.

Head over there and see what you can do.
Oh, good. Now we can get supplies down there.
